Key Arguments: The bill undermines freedom of speech and human rights.
It gives the government excessive power to determine what constitutes hate speech, misinformation, and disinformation.
The bill exempts the government, education, and media from accountability under these laws.
Notable Quotes: This bill totally destroys the freedom of speech and human rights enshrined in our constitution.
They can spread whatever misinformation and disinformation they like and not be accountable.
